column2: Toronto Police Service Why Are You Treating Us Like The Problem
column5: On July 3rd,,,The intention of this petition is to create a community response to the disturbing trend in Toronto Police Service's attitude toward those injured and endangered on the road. The idea is to get enough support to put pressure on them to correct it. To that end we'll be contacting both the Police and media once we have enough signatures to be effective. \r\n\r\nWhat's happening here is going to change. Together we can send a strong message to the Toronto Police Service that it has to change now."
